N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 361.8 - Supervision recordkeeping requirements

State Regulations
(a) The official case record shall be
identified by name and number in system. (b) The contents of the case record shall
include the following: (1)

Pre-plea/pre-sentence supplemental conditional release reports; orders and
conditional release; and any relevant legal documents. The department's case
record shall include information on all probation services rendered. (2)

Initial supervision plan, including the
date of the review of the conditions of conditional release; classification
documents; quarterly supervision reports; violation of conditional release
reports and any relevant legal documents. Each conditional releasee's
supervision plan, including assessment of needs and objectives, shall be
reviewed on a quarterly period basis, and a summary analysis shall be recorded
on the case record. (c) Case records shall be maintained in a legible, cost efficient and accessible
manner which facilitates decisionmaking and ensures the privacy, preservation
and security of such records. (d) Accessibility to supervision case records is limited only to those authorized
by law or court order. Notes
